title: Digital Marketing Specialist
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH SG SAGAWA VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Managing marketing campaigns
Manage all digital marketing channels
Measure ROI and KPIs
Prepare and manage a digital marketing budget
Manage and improve online content, considering SEO and Google Analytics
Build an inbound marketing plan
Planning for email marketing
Graphic edit and design, creating stories, reels
requirements:
• Business level English.
• At least 2 years relevant experience
• Deep technical knowledge of SEO, SEM, Social Media, Google Analytics, Adwords.
• Experience with social media tags.
• Familiar with tools for email marketing.
• Ability to write good copy and/or graphic design will be a plus.
P/s: Please send us English CV
career_tags: Digital Advertising (e.g., Google Ads, Social Media Ads)
